name: 安娜·贝格
introduction: Anna Linh Nguyen Berg (1992) is a Norwegian Vietnamese composer from Kolbotn, Norway, based in Paris, Oslo and Innlandet.Berg has a Bachelor’s degree in composition from The Norwegian Academy of Music (2017-2021), and a Master’s degree in composition from The Norwegian Academy of Music and Conservatoire National Supérieur de Musique et de Danse de Paris (2021-2023).In her catalogue, you can find works for a wide range of ensembles such as symphony orchestra, string orchestra, sinfonietta and choir, in addition to works for chamber constellations such as string quartets and trios.She also creates music for film and dance, and has created the score for the film DREAMS by reknown Norwegian director Dag Johan Haugerud.
